value: Magic toy boat. While on this boat, you can't drown if the boat is completely dry. ~20cm long
Magic glasses. While wearing this, you perceive every creature as looking like you
Invisible ink marker. The ink can only be made visible with the use of a Wish spell. Good for 1d20 words.
The autobiography of a horse named https://appzaza.com/random-interjection-generator
Mitts that give +1 hand warmth, but are too awkward and big to hold anything
A waterproof towel. Takes 2 carrying capacity
